document.full_text: davis cup organizers rejected spain's appeal on thursday, and said the united states' choice of a hardcourt surface for the quarterfinal in july in austin, tex., met regulations.
document.title: davis cup throws out spain appeal of u.s. surface
lines_and_colors: davis cup organizers rejected spain's appeal on thursday, and said the united states' choice of a hardcourt surface for the quarterfinal in july in austin, tex., met regulations.
